mapper.select: select ORDERID, TRADEID, ORDERWEIGHT, EXPRESSID1, EXPRESSID2, EXPRESSID4, EXPRESSID3, EXPRESSID5, EXPRESSID6, EXPRESSID7, EXPRESSID8, EXPRESSID9, EXPRESSID10, EXPRESSID11, EXPRESSID12, EXPRESSID13, EXPRESSID14, EXPRESSID15, EXPRESSID16, EXPRESSID17, EXPRESSID18, EXPRESSID19, EXPRESSID20, MINEXPRESS, EXPRESSTYPEID, EXPRESSTYPE, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, CHINAEXPRESS, CHINAEXPRESSCOUNTRY, CHINAEXPRESSAREA from db_order_express where ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ORDERID, TRADEID, ORDERWEIGHT, EXPRESSID1, EXPRESSID2, EXPRESSID4, EXPRESSID3, EXPRESSID5, EXPRESSID6, EXPRESSID7, EXPRESSID8, EXPRESSID9, EXPRESSID10, EXPRESSID11, EXPRESSID12, EXPRESSID13, EXPRESSID14, EXPRESSID15, EXPRESSID16, EXPRESSID17, EXPRESSID18, EXPRESSID19, EXPRESSID20, MINEXPRESS, EXPRESSTYPEID, EXPRESSTYPE, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, CHINAEXPRESS, CHINAEXPRESSCOUNTRY, CHINAEXPRESSAREA from db_order_express
mapper.sql: ORDERID , TRADEID , ORDERWEIGHT , EXPRESSID1 , EXPRESSID2 , EXPRESSID4 , EXPRESSID3 , EXPRESSID5 , EXPRESSID6 , EXPRESSID7 , EXPRESSID8 , EXPRESSID9 , EXPRESSID10 , EXPRESSID11 , EXPRESSID12 , EXPRESSID13 , EXPRESSID14 , EXPRESSID15 , EXPRESSID16 , EXPRESSID17 , EXPRESSID18 , EXPRESSID19 , EXPRESSID20 , MINEXPRESS , EXPRESSTYPEID , EXPRESSTYPE , RESERVE1 , RESERVE2 , RESERVE3 , RESERVE4 , CHINAEXPRESS , CHINAEXPRESSCOUNTRY , CHINAEXPRESSAREA

ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
TRADEID = #{tradeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ORDERWEIGHT = #{orderweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
EXPRESSID1 = #{expressid1,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
EXPRESSID2 = #{expressid2,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
EXPRESSID4 = #{expressid4,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
EXPRESSID3 = #{expressid3,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and

EXPRESSID6 = #{expressid6,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and

EXPRESSID18 = #{expressid18,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
EXPRESSID19 = #{expressid19,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and

and 1=1
